name: Tank Battler v0.0.6
description:
This is a work in progress game made in 30 minutes!

This is a 2 player game and to move the RED player tank, use WASD and E to shoot! To move the YELLOW player tank, use ARROW KEYS and / to shoot!

Enjoy the game!

(This game is still in alpha development thus this is not finished and in the future will have many more tanks, upgrades, maps and more!)
